name: Ad Spend Standardizer
description: Unifies advertising spend data from Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and other platforms into a standardized schema.
author: Dagster Community

inputs.description: Connect Google Ads, Facebook Ads, or other ad platform data

outputs.description: Standardized ad spend data with unified schema

asset_name.label: Asset Name
asset_name.description: Name of the standardized ad spend output asset

google_ads_asset.label: Google Ads Asset
google_ads_asset.description: Google Ads data asset (automatically set via lineage)

facebook_ads_asset.label: Facebook Ads Asset
facebook_ads_asset.description: Facebook Ads data asset (automatically set via lineage)

other_ad_platform_asset.label: Other Ad Platform Asset
other_ad_platform_asset.description: Other ad platform data asset (automatically set via lineage)

currency_normalization.label: Currency
currency_normalization.description: Normalize all spend to this currency

date_column_name.label: Date Column Name
date_column_name.description: Name of the date column in source data

aggregate_by_day.label: Aggregate by Day
aggregate_by_day.description: Aggregate metrics by day for consistency

include_zero_spend_days.label: Include Zero Spend Days
include_zero_spend_days.description: Include days with zero spend in output

calculate_derived_metrics.label: Calculate Derived Metrics
calculate_derived_metrics.description: Automatically calculate CTR, CPC, CPA, ROAS
